SLEDS is Minnesotaâ€™s Statewide Longitudinal Education Data System. It is a linkable data repository to identify, organize, and analyze education and workforce data. Our lab is using the SLEDS data to study college attendance patterns for students from different backgrounds, focusing particularly on sex differences in college going behaviors and college successes.
